name: Phantasy of Delivery
description:
# 開發中   # WorkInProgress   # WinterVNJam

抱歉，我們現時只能提供中文試玩版，中英完整版仍在開發中。

Sorry, only Chinese Alpha Ver. is available here.
English Version is working in progress.

故事簡介 Description   

《夢想速遞》是一個章節之間充滿小遊戲的視覺型小說遊戲。
故事是關於一個聖誕老公公，耶公，在運送禮物的途中發生空難，掉進太平洋的故事，來跟我們在這個奇幻的冬天一起運送禮物吧！

"Phantasy of Delivery" is a visual novel game with some mini games between each chapter. The story is about a Santa Claus, Sanpa, who fall into Pacific Ocean during his delivery, come to get all the delivery done together in this fantasy winter journey!

  開發團隊 Our Dev Team  

我們是一個來自臺灣就讀數位媒體設計系的二人團隊。
我們正在學習Unity，熱愛小遊戲，講笑話，玩各種迷因和梗！
這次的小說和遊戲結構大綱是我們的共同創作。

We are a 2-man Digital Media Design university student team from Taiwan. We are studying unity and we love mini games, joke and meme! We write the novel and game idea together! 

  • Promise Chung 鍾樂賢
    ( 墨綠青玄 @promise_chung )
    來自香港的隊長   Team Leader from Hong Kong

    負責大部分2D美術和3D建模素材，製作所有小遊戲，還有整個遊戲的程式，界面設計和操作部分，也負責創作一部分的背景音樂，現在忙於把小說文本翻譯成不同語言。
    Who do most of the 2D and 3D material, game code (mini game part), UI and control setting (for whole game), also make some of the BGM music. Now translating the whole novel into different language.

  • Zhi Heng Lew 劉治恆
    (Uncle Weird @zhiheng0302)
    來自馬來西亞的搭檔   Partner from Malaysia

    負責整個遊戲的小說和色彩繽紛的CG部分，所有的 SFX也是他搜尋而來，現在在研究遊戲的語言設定系統和其他新篇章。
    Who do the visual novel game part and animating the novel, all colorful CG came out from his hand, he also find all the SFX you can heard in the game! He is now learning how to apply the language setting into our novel.
# MadeInUnity
